This is 1 bedroom apartment. The facilities and amenities in this apartment is brand new. 
 
The is 1 bedroom room apartment. One queen size bed only. Will provide single mattress for extra person. For the ladies, there is also a large walk-in closet. 
 
It is fully furnished and comes with basic cooking appliances to you to cook up a simple meal. 
 
Located just 6min walk from Paya Lebar MRT, you are well connected as it is just 5 stops away to to downtown Singapore. 
 
Despite the Geylang address, known for its red light district (and yummy food), the vice is actually a good 25min walk away - VERY VERY far. The area that you are in is a decant residential neighborhood where family live. Not hookers. 
 
WIFI is provided in the apartment. 
 
I am renting out the entire 1 bedroom apartment so you need not to share with anyone. All the furnishing and equipment are in good working order. 
 
Someone will meet you during check-in to do the handover. During your stay, should there be any issue with the apartment, we will try our very best to resolve it. 
 
I would be happy to recommend places to eat, shop, drink and play.Local food is the major plus for resident in Geylang. You will be never short of good and cheap local food. There is way too many to recommend and I suggest that you food blog the places to eat. 
 
Residents can get to nearby supermarkets or shopping mall within the area for an array of amenities such as grocery and retail shopping, banks, eateries and more. 
 
This apartment is near to Geylang East. It is also close to City Plaza and Tanjong Katong Complex. 
 
Paya Lebar is a major train interchange where you can take either the green line (East-West) or the Circle Line (Marina Bay or Harbourfront). It is seriously very convenient. 
 
From the airport, it is 15min by cab 
 
If you take a taxi to town area, it is also 15-20min. 
 
We do provide: 
 
- a fresh set of bed sheet, pillow cover and blanket. 
 
- bath towels (1 per pax) 
 
We do not provide: 
 
- Bathroom amenities (soap/shampoo) 
 
- Clothing washing detergent.

postingbody:
QR Code Link to This Post 
  
 
What make us stand up from other accommodation providers is our location,we are the only host that is located in a Orchard Road address,we are located on top of Centrepoint Shopping Centre right along Orchard Road. 
 
Centrepoint Shopping Centre has been around since the 1970s and is an iconic heritage shopping mall.Some guests from the UK has compared the Orchard Road to London's Oxford street, while guests of ours from the US call the location to name of Fifth Avenue, as the Japanese felt a strong resemble of Orchard road to their district of GInza area. 
 
Centrepoint Shopping Centre houses many major established retailers, Robinsons, Marks and Spencer's and Harvey Norman etc. For food lovers,there are many quality restaurants in the mall like Chinese, Japanese, Thai, Western and even Indonesian restaurants open in regular hours for business. Fast food chains in the mall includes,Mc Donald's, Subways and Long John Silver etc.

Situated 5 minutes stroll from Tanjong Pagar MRT station, and right behind the main CBD area, this apartment brings you the most convenient location to stay in, and provides you with access to flavourful districts such as the Tanjong Pagar conserved street as well as the Amoy Street and Telok Ayer areas.

This is a very big 1 bedroom condominium as you can see from the photo. Nested in a very premium condo, the pool is definitely the selling point of the apartment. Great for sun tanning and lazing around. Fits 2 comfortably and if you have 1 child, we can provide extra mattress. 
 
This is 1 bedroom apartment. The facilities and amenities in this apartment is brand new. 
 
The is 1 bedroom room apartment. One queen size bed only. Will provide single mattress for extra person. For the ladies, there is also a large walk-in closet. 
 
It is fully furnished and comes with basic cooking appliances to you to cook up a simple meal. 
 
Located just 6min walk from Paya Lebar MRT, you are well connected as it is just 5 stops away to to downtown Singapore. 
 
Despite the Geylang address, known for its red light district (and yummy food), the vice is actually a good 25min walk away - VERY VERY far. The area that you are in is a decant residential neighborhood where family live. Not hookers. 
 
WIFI is provided in the apartment. 
 
I am renting out the entire 1 bedroom apartment so you need not to share with anyone. All the furnishing and equipment are in good working order. 
 
Someone will meet you during check-in to do the handover. During your stay, should there be any issue with the apartment, we will try our very best to resolve it. 
 
I would be happy to recommend places to eat, shop, drink and play.Local food is the major plus for resident in Geylang. You will be never short of good and cheap local food. There is way too many to recommend and I suggest that you food blog the places to eat. 
 
Residents can get to nearby supermarkets or shopping mall within the area for an array of amenities such as grocery and retail shopping, banks, eateries and more. 
 
This apartment is near to Geylang East. It is also close to City Plaza and Tanjong Katong Complex. 
 
Paya Lebar is a major train interchange where you can take either the green line (East-West) or the Circle Line (Marina Bay or Harbourfront). It is seriously very convenient. 
 
From the airport, it is 15min by cab 
 
If you take a taxi to town area, it is also 15-20min. 
 
We do provide: 
 
- a fresh set of bed sheet, pillow cover and blanket. 
 
- bath towels (1 per pax) 
 
We do not provide: 
 
- Bathroom amenities (soap/shampoo) 
 
- Clothing washing detergent.

postingbody:

Entire cozy 4 bedroom flat about 1600 spf, at most popular expat spot & central scenic area, short walk to Clark quay, Roberson quay, Chinatown,Financial center, Orchard road. Nice bars & restaurants & SG river at door step. Great for sight seeing. Walking distance to most famous spots in town. Save ur time and sweat for transportation. Fast WIFI. 
 
Entire spacious 4 bedroom with 3 bathrooms, about 160 square meters, cozy apartment at Robertson Quay, the most popular dinning area in CBD center, beside river. plenty of bars & restaurants down starts and many boutique shop houses which are great attraction for tourist. Gym, huge swimming pool and tennis court available for your use. 
 
Very spacious living room and kitchen, Each room is well furnished with writing table, sofa and big wardrobe for your personal belongings. We provide comfortable bedding and peaceful surrounding to ensure that you feel like home. 
 
Most central in CBD, surrounded by many high end condos, shopping malls, office buildings and beautiful boutique shop houses. Walking distance to Clark Quay, Boat Quay, Chinatown, Orchard. If u don't mind walking, it's a very enjoyable walk along river to Raffles Place and Marina Bay Sands as well. The best place to experience the trendy metropolitan life in Singapore. 
 
Guest Access 
 
Included With Your Stay: 
- Big TV in living room. 
- All bedding, linen and fresh towels 
- Shampoo & shower gel or soap, shower gel. 
- Unlimited high speed Wifi Internet 
- Free washer and drier usage (free laundry detergent provided) 
- In-room air-conditioning 
- Kitchen usage & cooking welcome 
- Hair drier, iron, and ironing board available 
- Self-serve tea and coffee in kitchen 
- Global Universal sockets & adapters 
 
Within Condo Facilities: 
- 24 hours security 
- swimming pool & Gym 
 
For your reference: This is popular tourist area, more than 10 hotels nearby, hotel price is about SGD$300/night for 2 person only. 
 
Interaction with Guests 
 
I'm traveling most of the times. Whenever i'm free, I will be more than happy to share with u my insights of Singapore and give u my personal tips. Also I will provide tourist maps and my own introduction booklet in the living room for reference. 
 
The Neighbourhood 
 
Roberson Quay is the most exclusive area for entertainment, hundreds of trendy bars and restaurants around this place, many historic old shop houses and high end residential, shopping malls and office around, you can find all your need within a few minutes walk. And the beautiful Singapore river is at door step, very enjoyable for a walk. 
 
-Nearest MRT station is Clark Quay, about 8-10 minutes walk along beautiful Singapore river. 
 
- 3 bus stops around this condo area. U can search by: gothere doc sg for detail transport guidance. 
- Shopping mall, banks, bars and restaurants, whatever u need can be found downstairs or within 2-5 minutes walk.

postingbody:

What make us stand up from other accommodation providers is our location,we are the only host that is located in a Orchard Road address,we are located on top of Centrepoint Shopping Centre right along Orchard Road. 
 
Centrepoint Shopping Centre has been around since the 1970s and is an iconic heritage shopping mall.Some guests from the UK has compared the Orchard Road to London's Oxford street, while guests of ours from the US call the location to name of Fifth Avenue, as the Japanese felt a strong resemble of Orchard road to their district of GInza area. 
 
Centrepoint Shopping Centre houses many major established retailers, Robinsons, Marks and Spencer's and Harvey Norman etc. For food lovers,there are many quality restaurants in the mall like Chinese, Japanese, Thai, Western and even Indonesian restaurants open in regular hours for business. Fast food chains in the mall includes,Mc Donald's, Subways and Long John Silver etc. 
 
Cold storage is a popular supermarket that you can buy all daily groceries. 7/11 is opens 24 hrs for you to purchase any late night needs. 
 
Public transportation is easily accessible, we are 5 minutes walk to sommerset MRT station,right at the door step of the mall is a taxi stand and the cab driver will readily to fetch you to any desire destination. 
 
This is 3 bedrooms apartment with a living room well furnished with a television, sofa and is attached to the kitchenette.

* Plush furnishing and fittings. 
 
* Individually controlled ari-con. 
 
* Flat screen Television with local channels 
 
SERVICES

FACILITIES

* Internet Capablities. 
 
Thanks for taking time to read our introduction and hope to see you in Singapore soon.

postingbody:
QR Code Link to This Post 
  
 
This apartment is located right at the heart of Singapore, 3 minutes walk to Tanjong Pagar MRT, financial area, historical reservations, tourists attractions and China Town is in the walking distance. Life is super convenient, shopping, food courts, restaurants, pubs and supermarkets are within 3-5 minutes walk. 
 
This apartment is 1173 sqf, 2 storeys, 2 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, regular layout, comfortably fit for 4 persons or more, a king-sized bed upstairs in the master room, a super single and a pull out single bed in the downstairs common room. Furnished kitchen. Can add mattress in the upstairs master room and living room. It is furnished as the service apartment. Just bring your luggage. 
 
Master room can put one more mattress for kid to stay. 
 
Guests will have access to the 50 meter swimming pool, aqua aerobics pools, refexology water jests,gym, Jacuzzis, sauna, Tennis courts, BBQ pits. WIFI, cable TV, a full kitchen inside the apartment. 
 
I am in Singapore most of the time. Can help the guests while they are in Singapore. I do the check in and check out, keep contact with guests. 
 
This neighbourhood is one of the oldest in Singapore, very dynamic still. On one part, you will see the old and traditional Singapore neighbourhood: new and old HDB flats, historically conserved shop houses, Chinese and Indian temples; on the other part, you see modern Singapore, sky scrapers in the financial areas, luxury hotels. You will experience Singapore's short history. Life is also extremely convenient: shopping, three supermarkets, banks, post office, food courts, restaurants, pubs are all within 3-5 minutes walk. 
 
The Tanjong Pagar MRT is only 3 minutes walk, easy to get a taxi also. From the airport, you can take a cab about 17 minutes, about S$20. If you only have a hand luggage, you can take a train directly to Tanjong Pagar, about 30 min.

OVERVIEW 
 
Single Storey Skyvilla Penthouse Overlooking the Central Business District & Sentosa Waterfront precinct. Located just minutes away from a host of shopping, dining, entertainment options & 2 MRT lines. 
 
ABOUT 
 
Luxurious and modern apartment along the Waterfront Promenade with fully equipped kitchen, huge dining area, common living and entertainment area, outdoor patio, and four bedrooms. It is tastefully furnished and boasts of floor to ceiling windows overlooking the Central Business District & Sentosa Waterfront Precinct.
title: Beautiful penthouse overlooking Sentosa Island

postingbody:
QR Code Link to This Post 
  
 
Three Bedrooms Apartment with king sized beds. There are 2 bathrooms; one ensuite and one common. There is also a washer, dryer and a 40" TV within the apartment. 
 
There is a kitchen, mirowave oven, cooking stove, pots, pans, cutlery to whip up a nice meal. 
 
The apartment is extremely conveniently located. Harbourfront MRT is just across the road (5 mins walk) 
 
A large shopping mall - Vivo City - is just at harbourfront mrt. 
 
Vivo City has many restaurants, a large supermarket and amenities. You can easily get to Sentosa by taking a monorail from Harbourfront. Walking to Sentosa is also possible - 5-7mins. Raffles Place - by cab 7 mins. Orchard Road - 10mins. Airport - 15-20mins - depending on traffic. 
 
Wifi is included in the apartment.
title: Charming, Quiet, Beautiful With All Actvities In Singapore
